oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge paper for Private John C. Edmonson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge paper for Pvt. John C. Edmonson, Co. B, 7th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt, USA. The 7th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA was composed primarily of men from Anderson, Knox, Campbell, Meigs, and Monroe Counties of Tenn. Edmondson enlisted Oct. 31, 1864 at age 45 in Athens, Tenn. He was discharged on July 27, 1865 with the rest of the regiment in Nashville, Tennessee. The regiment spent most of the war on anti-guerrilla duty in and around Athens, Tennessee and fought a skirmish there on Jan. 29, 1864.
